titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd before the Right Honourable the lord mayor and Court of Aldermen at St. Bridget's Church on Tuesday in Easter-week, 1694 / by Sa. Freeman ...
titleStmt.author: Freeman, Samuel, 1643-1700.

notesStmt.note: Half-title page reads: The Dean of Peterborough's sermon before the lord-mayor, at St. Bridget's Church in Easter-week, 1694.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
